Name: Monitor Interval
Description: How frequently (in minutes) the coverage stats should be updated.

Name: Deployer Interval
Description: How frequently (in minutes) assets should be scanned for agent deployments.

Name: Targets
Description: If left blank, the local subnet will be used. Accepts IPs, IP ranges, and CIDRs. All separated by commas.

Name: Failure Threshold
Description: The number of fails of each deployment type before an endpoint is considered to be failed.
